artefact.overview: To operate a commercial or sponsored local bus service in London, you need to apply to the Licensing Manager at Transport for London (TfL) for a London service permit
artefact.licence_short_description: To operate a commercial or sponsored local bus service in London, you need to apply to the Licensing Manager at Transport for London (TfL) for a London service permit.
artefact.licence_overview:
To operate a commercial or sponsored local bus service in London, you need to apply to the Licensing Manager at [Transport for London (TfL)](http://www.tfl.gov.uk/ "Transport for London"){:rel="external"} for a London service permit.

[TfL]: Transport for London
